review: Mostly an enjoyable experience.  Easy installation and operation.  Only minor caveat is the "Auto" setting for picture quality - causes the picture and sound to constantly try to sync up.  To avoid the constant mismatch between picture and sound, you have to manually set the quality to this highest setting it will handle without mismatch.
author: Lawrence L.

review: Great box easy to use I just wish it came with a keyboard.
author: Chris L.
